name: Shoot The Boss Free: Beat The Boss With No Mercy!
name_original: Shoot The Boss Free: Beat The Boss With No Mercy!
description:
** BALANCE YOUR WORK RELATIONSHIPS IN A WAY IT IS MEANT TO BE!! **

** BOW AND ARROW GAME TO PUT YOUR BOSS IN HIS PLACE!!! **



All the boss does is whining and nagging you! You work all day and all he does is counting the money that he never uses for rising your salary!

IT IS TIME TO DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT!!!!

Here is a formula you can do!

1) Place boss next to a wall!

2) Place bag of money on boss head!

3) Shoot it!!!

4) The boss gets more scared each time you hit the target!

5) Once you have totally shrinked that fellow to his place you can ask for a raise!!!!

6) Also, dont forget to ask for extra vacation days!


ENJOY!!
